Class CustomFont

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Font
com.nnamo.view.customcomponents.CustomFont
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CustomFont extends Font
Custom Font utilized across the application, specifically set to value that are used in multiple components.
Author:
Riccardo Finocchiaro
